leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-分子动力学与力场生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 力场→模拟→分析→可视化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: MD引擎 + 势模型 + 分析

queries: [WEB] materials science simulation pipeline tools github
[WEB] AiiDA plugins for molecular dynamics github
[WEB] automated force field fitting workflow github

tools.name: HTMD
tools.one_line_profile: Programmable environment for molecular discovery and MD simulation analysis
tools.detailed_description: HTMD is a molecular-specific programming environment that provides tools for system preparation, simulation execution (adaptive sampling), and analysis (Markov state models) of molecular dynamics trajectories.

tools.name: aiida-gromacs
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with GROMACS, enabling provenance tracking and automation of molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: WFacer
tools.one_line_profile: Automated cluster expansion workflows using atomate2 and Jobflow
tools.detailed_description: A tool for modulating and automating cluster expansion calculations in materials science, built upon the atomate2 and Jobflow frameworks.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen addon for parsing Quantum ESPRESSO files
tools.detailed_description: An extension to the pymatgen library specifically designed for parsing input and output files from the Quantum ESPRESSO DFT code.

tools.name: aiida-fleur
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the FLEUR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to manage and automate calculations using the FLEUR code (all-electron DFT).

tools.name: aiida-kkr
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the JuKKR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to manage and automate calculations using the JuKKR code (KKR Green function method).

tools.name: VisualDynamics
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for automating GROMACS simulations
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform designed to automate the setup and execution of GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations, providing a visual interface for the workflow.

tools.name: atomate2-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow definitions for LAMMPS molecular dynamics within the atomate2 framework
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for atomate2 that provides pre-defined workflows and computational recipes for running Molecular Dynamics simulations using LAMMPS. It enables high-throughput execution and management of LAMMPS jobs.

tools.name: jobflow-remote
tools.one_line_profile: Remote execution manager for jobflow workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate the execution of jobflow-based workflows on remote computing resources. It handles job submission, monitoring, and data retrieval in distributed scientific computing environments.

tools.name: LLM-ELN
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-integrated Electronic Lab Notebook for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A tool integrating Large Language Models (LLMs) with Electronic Lab Notebooks (ELNs) to enhance data management and accelerate innovation in materials science research, specifically tailored for workflows at KIT.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for deep learning on molecules and crystals
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and materials, designed to work seamlessly with RDKit and Pymatgen data structures.

tools.name: ScalableWorkflow_VASP_Calculations
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generating VASP input cases for alloys
tools.detailed_description: A scalable workflow designed to generate VASP input files with randomized atomic structures for solid solution binary and ternary alloys, covering the entire compositional range.

tools.name: dfttk-archived
tools.one_line_profile: Archived DFT workflows for finite temperature thermodynamics
tools.detailed_description: An archived version of the DFTTK package, providing density functional theory workflows based on atomate for calculating finite temperature thermodynamic properties.

tools.name: dfttk
tools.one_line_profile: Automation package for VASP workflows and thermodynamic calculations
tools.detailed_description: DFTTK is a Python package that automates VASP workflows using atomate and stores results in MongoDB. It focuses on calculating thermodynamic properties of materials at finite temperatures.

tools.name: dfttk-2021
tools.one_line_profile: DFT workflows for finite temperature thermodynamics (2021 version)
tools.detailed_description: A version of the DFTTK package providing workflows for Density Functional Theory calculations, specifically targeting finite temperature thermodynamics using atomate.

tools.name: quacc
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible platform for high-throughput computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: quacc is a platform for computational materials science and quantum chemistry, built to handle big data. It provides a flexible workflow environment for running calculations with various codes (like VASP, ASE calculators) in a reproducible manner.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching with chemically-guided bond distortions
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for identifying the ground-state structures of point defects in solids. It employs chemically-guided bond distortions to escape local minima and find the true energy minimum structure.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generation and analysis of defect supercell calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python software suite for managing defect simulation workflows. It handles the generation of defect structures, pre-processing of inputs, and post-processing/analysis of results for defect supercell calculations.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for slab generation and surface analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating and analyzing slab structures for first-principles surface calculations. It simplifies the setup of surface simulations in materials science.

tools.name: VASP-DOS_extractor
tools.one_line_profile: Script to extract DOS data from VASP outputs
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based Python script designed to extract Density of States (DOS) and projected DOS data from `vasprun.xml` files generated by VASP calculations.

tools.name: VASP-Structural_Descriptors
tools.one_line_profile: Script for collecting structural descriptors from atomic structures
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based script for calculating and collecting structural descriptors from large sets of atomic structures, useful for machine learning and materials informatics.

tools.name: aiida-champ
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CHAMP QMC code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the CHAMP code, enabling automated Quantum Monte Carlo (QMC) calculations and workflow management.

tools.name: aiida-qp2
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin designed to manage workflows for Quantum Package 2.0, facilitating quantum chemistry calculations within the AiiDA infrastructure.

tools.name: htp_md
tools.one_line_profile: Infrastructure for high-throughput MD trajectory analysis
tools.detailed_description: A shared repository for developing infrastructure and tools for the analysis of molecular dynamics trajectories, specifically targeting high-throughput workflows.

tools.name: mcp-atomictoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server for atomistic simulations via ASE and Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An MCP (Model Context Protocol) compatible server that exposes atomistic simulation capabilities. It acts as a bridge, allowing AI agents or other tools to perform simulations using libraries like ASE and Pymatgen.

tools.name: CPTI
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for constant potential thermodynamic integration in VASP
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool designed to perform constant potential thermodynamic integration calculations using VASP, enabling the calculation of free energies in electrochemical systems.

tools.name: FastMDSimulation
tools.one_line_profile: Software for automated Molecular Dynamics simulation
tools.detailed_description: A software package designed to automate the process of setting up and running Molecular Dynamics simulations, aiming to streamline the workflow for researchers.

tools.name: CHAPERONg
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for GROMACS MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: CHAPERONg is an automated pipeline script for running Molecular Dynamics simulations and performing trajectory analyses using GROMACS, simplifying the execution of complex simulation protocols.

tools.name: NepTrain
tools.one_line_profile: Automated toolkit for training neuroevolution potentials (NEP) with GPUMD and VASP
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit designed to streamline the workflow of training neuroevolution potentials (NEP). It integrates first-principles calculations (VASP) and molecular dynamics simulations (GPUMD) to automate tasks such as perturbation generation, active learning, single-point energy calculations, and potential training.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: Custodian-based VASP plugin for AiiDA workflows
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with VASP, utilizing Custodian for robust error handling and job management during high-throughput calculations.

tools.name: aiida-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for phonon calculations using Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: Integrates the Phonopy code into the AiiDA framework, enabling automated workflows for phonon calculations, including pre-processing, force calculations, and post-processing analysis.

tools.name: aiida-trains-pot
tools.one_line_profile: Automated active learning workflow for training neural network potentials in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA workflow implementation that automates the active learning scheme for training neural network interatomic potentials, managing data generation, training, and validation cycles.

tools.name: aiida-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: Official AiiDA plugin for VASP simulations
tools.detailed_description: The primary plugin for running Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP) calculations within the AiiDA framework, supporting provenance tracking, workflow management, and data parsing.

tools.name: AiiDAlab
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for computational science workflows based on AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform that provides a user-friendly environment for accessing AiiDA workflows and applications. It implements core functions to manage apps, authentication, and interaction with the AiiDA backend.

tools.name: AiiDAlab Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for running Quantum ESPRESSO workflows
tools.detailed_description: A graphical application running on the AiiDAlab platform that simplifies the execution and analysis of Quantum ESPRESSO calculations, providing an intuitive interface for complex DFT workflows.

tools.name: aiida-ase
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE)
tools.detailed_description: Enables the use of ASE calculators and structures within AiiDA workflows, bridging the gap between AiiDA's provenance engine and ASE's extensive simulation capabilities.

tools.name: aiida-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: Provides an interface to run LAMMPS simulations via AiiDA, supporting various potential types and calculation protocols while ensuring full data provenance.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized workflow interfaces for materials science codes in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing common interfaces for workflows across different quantum engines (e.g., VASP, QE, CP2K) in AiiDA, facilitating cross-code verification and interoperability.

tools.name: AiiDA Core
tools.one_line_profile: Automated interactive infrastructure and database for computational science
tools.detailed_description: The core engine of the AiiDA framework, providing a flexible and scalable infrastructure for managing computational workflows, tracking data provenance, and facilitating high-throughput research.

tools.name: aiida-cp2k
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CP2K simulations
tools.detailed_description: Allows running CP2K calculations within AiiDA, enabling complex molecular dynamics and electronic structure workflows with provenance tracking.

tools.name: aiida-hubbard
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for calculating Hubbard parameters from first-principles
tools.detailed_description: Implements workflows to calculate self-consistent onsite and intersite Hubbard U and V parameters using linear response theory within the AiiDA framework.

tools.name: aiida-project
tools.one_line_profile: Project management tool for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool and library for managing AiiDA projects, facilitating the organization, export, and sharing of research data and workflows.

tools.name: aiida-quantumespresso
tools.one_line_profile: Official AiiDA plugin for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: Provides a comprehensive interface for running Quantum ESPRESSO calculations (PWscf, PHonon, etc.) via AiiDA, including advanced workflows for band structures, relaxation, and properties.

tools.name: aiida-restapi
tools.one_line_profile: REST API service for AiiDA data access
tools.detailed_description: A service that exposes AiiDA databases via a RESTful API, allowing external applications and users to query and retrieve scientific data and provenance information managed by AiiDA.

tools.name: aiida-shell
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for running arbitrary shell commands
tools.detailed_description: Enables the execution of standard shell commands as AiiDA processes, allowing users to integrate simple scripts and non-plugin codes into provenance-tracked workflows easily.

tools.name: aiida-submission-controller
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for managing high-throughput AiiDA submissions
tools.detailed_description: Provides classes and utilities to manage large batches of AiiDA process submissions, controlling concurrency and handling resubmissions for high-throughput computing tasks.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Wannier90
tools.detailed_description: Interfaces Wannier90 with AiiDA, enabling the calculation of maximally localized Wannier functions and related properties within automated workflows.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced automated workflows for Wannier90 in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A collection of robust, automated workflows for computing Wannier functions, handling the complex multistep process of wannierization automatically.

tools.name: aiida-workgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible workflow design and management for AiiDA with GUI
tools.detailed_description: An extension for AiiDA that allows users to design workflows using a graph-based approach, featuring a GUI for interactive construction and management of computational tasks.

tools.name: twod_materials
tools.one_line_profile: High throughput workflow tools for 2D materials characterization in VASP
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools and workflows designed for the high-throughput characterization of two-dimensional materials using VASP, including structure generation, stability analysis, and property calculation.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: JARVIS-Tools is a python library for atomistic materials design. It provides scripts for automation, data collection, and analysis of material properties using density functional theory (DFT), classical force-fields, and machine learning.

tools.name: aiida-vibroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automated infrared, Raman, and phonon calculations
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA-vibroscopy is a plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that automates the calculation of vibrational properties (IR, Raman spectra, phonons) using various quantum engines.

tools.name: NOMAD (Optimization)
tools.one_line_profile: Blackbox optimization software for simulation-based problems
tools.detailed_description: NOMAD is a C++ software for the optimization of blackbox functions, often used in engineering and scientific simulations where the objective function is expensive to evaluate and has no derivative information.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality atom and molecule rendering using Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that interfaces with Blender to create high-quality, publication-ready 3D renderings of atoms, molecules, and crystal structures.

tools.name: Signac (BioTuring)
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance analytics package for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: A C++ based analytics package designed for processing and analyzing large-scale single-cell data, offering efficient data structures and algorithms for single-cell genomics.

tools.name: Herbie
tools.one_line_profile: Download tool for numerical weather prediction datasets
tools.detailed_description: Herbie is a python package to download recent and archived numerical weather prediction (NWP) model output from various sources like NOMADS, AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure.

tools.name: MDFit
tools.one_line_profile: Automated MD workflow for protein-ligand dynamics
tools.detailed_description: MDFit is an automated molecular dynamics simulations workflow designed for high-throughput assessment of protein-ligand dynamics, facilitating drug discovery and interaction analysis.

tools.name: TAFFI
tools.one_line_profile: Automated force-field parameterization software
tools.detailed_description: TAFFI (Topology-Automated Force-Field Interactions) is a software package for the automated parameterization of molecular mechanics force fields, deriving parameters from quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: PotentialLearning.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for atomistic data optimization and potential learning
tools.detailed_description: PotentialLearning.jl is a Julia package designed to optimize atomistic data and train interatomic potential models (Machine Learning Potentials) for use in molecular dynamics workflows.

tools.name: ai2-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for AI-enhanced ab initio computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit that integrates artificial intelligence with ab initio methods for computational chemistry research, facilitating automated workflows and enhanced simulation capabilities.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced visualization for ASE/Pymatgen in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for creating highly configurable 2D (SVG) and 3D (Three.js) visualizations of atomic structures (ASE Atoms or Pymatgen Structures) directly within Jupyter Notebook environments.

tools.name: flowerMD
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible library for organic molecular dynamics workflows
tools.detailed_description: flowerMD is a Python library designed to create flexible and extensible workflows and recipes for molecular dynamics simulations, specifically targeting organic materials.

tools.name: planckton
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for reproducible organic photovoltaic morphology exploration
tools.detailed_description: Planckton is a tool for the reproducible exploration of organic photovoltaic morphology self-assembly using molecular dynamics simulations, facilitating the study of material structure-property relationships.

tools.name: DMFF
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Molecular Force Field based on Jax
tools.detailed_description: DMFF is a Jax-based Python package providing a fully differentiable implementation of molecular force field models, enabling gradient-based optimization and learning of force field parameters.

tools.name: deepmd-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation
tools.detailed_description: DeepMD-kit is a deep learning package that generates many-body potential energy surfaces (PES) and force fields for molecular dynamics, achieving ab initio accuracy with the efficiency of classical MD.

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction
tools.detailed_description: A generally applicable software implementation of the D4 London dispersion correction model, which depends on atomic charges to improve the accuracy of density functional theory (DFT) calculations.

tools.name: PhaseForge
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for high-throughput alloy phase diagram prediction
tools.detailed_description: PhaseForge is a framework that integrates machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) with ATAT and CALPHAD modeling to predict alloy phase diagrams via high-throughput structure relaxation and molecular dynamics.

tools.name: aiida-defects
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automating point defect calculations in materials
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine specifically designed to automate the setup, execution, and analysis of point defect calculations in crystalline materials, streamlining the study of defect thermodynamics.

tools.name: aiida-orca
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the ORCA quantum chemistry package
tools.detailed_description: An interface plugin connecting the ORCA quantum chemistry software with the AiiDA workflow manager, enabling automated submission and provenance tracking of ORCA calculations.

tools.name: ASE_VASP_automation
tools.one_line_profile: Automation scripts for VASP DFT workflows using ASE
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts leveraging the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) to automate VASP Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations, facilitating high-throughput screening and consistent simulation setups.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced electronic band structure plotting tool
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool built on pymatgen for generating enhanced electronic band structure plots, featuring RGB scaling to represent atomic or orbital contributions directly on the bands.

tools.name: PhononFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow tools for phonon calculations with VASP and phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A suite of scripts and tools designed to streamline the workflow for phonon calculations, integrating VASP for force calculations and phonopy for post-processing.

tools.name: vaspMD
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for Ab Initio and MLFF Molecular Dynamics with VASP
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and scripts to facilitate Ab Initio Molecular Dynamics (AIMD) and Machine Learning Force Field (MLFF) MD simulations using VASP, including pre-processing and post-processing utilities.

tools.name: ThermalConductivity-Workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for computing thermal conductivity via MD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated workflow for calculating thermal conductivity of materials using both non-equilibrium (NEMD) and equilibrium (EMD) molecular dynamics simulation techniques.

tools.name: signac
tools.one_line_profile: Data management framework for computational science
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to manage large and heterogeneous data spaces on the file system, specifically tailored for computational research workflows to track parameters and state points.

tools.name: signac-dashboard
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization dashboard for signac data spaces
tools.detailed_description: A web-based dashboard interface for visualizing and searching data managed by the signac framework, allowing researchers to inspect simulation states and results interactively.

tools.name: signac-flow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management for signac projects
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the signac framework that manages the submission and execution of data-dependent workflows, particularly on High-Performance Computing (HPC) clusters.

tools.name: atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built workflows for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library of pre-defined, robust workflows for computational materials science, primarily using VASP and FireWorks, enabling high-throughput materials properties calculations.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An open-source program based on Pymatgen for processing materials simulation data, providing utilities for structure manipulation and property analysis.

tools.name: hzdplugins
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for AiiDA structure construction and viewing
tools.detailed_description: A collection of plugins and tools for the AiiDA platform, focusing on assisting with the construction of initial structures for simulations and visualizing results.

tools.name: compchem_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Computational chemistry helper functions for AiiDA and VASP
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit containing Python functions to facilitate working with AiiDA, Pymatgen, and VASP, designed to accelerate input setup and output analysis for computational chemistry.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ASE interface for ANI neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface connecting the ANI-1 neural network potential with the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE), enabling ML-driven molecular dynamics and optimization.

tools.name: aiidalab-ispg
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA Lab app for ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA Lab application (ATMOSPEC) designed to make ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy calculations accessible, providing a user-friendly interface for complex spectral simulations.

tools.name: CrystalNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for accurate prediction of material properties
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework leveraging large-scale computational databases to predict material properties, specifically designed for materials science applications.

tools.name: workflow_inference_compiler
tools.one_line_profile: DSL for inferring CWL workflow edges with molecular dynamics support
tools.detailed_description: A Domain Specific Language (DSL) and compiler that infers edges for Common Workflow Language (CWL) DAGs, facilitating the construction of complex workflows including molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: jkitchin/vasp
tools.one_line_profile: ASE-compliant Python interface for VASP
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing an Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) compliant interface to the Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP), enabling users to run and analyze DFT calculations programmatically.

tools.name: pourbaix
tools.one_line_profile: Pourbaix diagram generator using pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for generating Pourbaix (potential-pH) diagrams using the pymatgen package, essential for understanding aqueous corrosion and electrochemical stability of materials.

tools.name: structuregraph-helpers
tools.one_line_profile: Helpers for working with pymatgen structure graphs
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper functions to facilitate the manipulation and analysis of structure graphs generated by pymatgen, aiding in structural analysis of materials.

tools.name: perovskites-distortions
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for hybrid organic-inorganic perovskite structures
tools.detailed_description: A collection of functions to manipulate and analyze the structural distortions of hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites, useful for studying structure-property relationships.

tools.name: construction_zone
tools.one_line_profile: Generators for nanoscale atomic scenes and S/TEM simulation
tools.detailed_description: Modules for generating nanoscale atomic scenes using pymatgen, specifically designed to support S/TEM (Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy) image simulation workflows.

tools.name: aiida-lsmo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflows for LSMO laboratory
tools.detailed_description: A collection of AiiDA workflows and plugins developed for the LSMO laboratory, facilitating reproducible computational materials science research.

tools.name: aiida-raspa
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for RASPA simulation code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with RASPA, a software package for simulating adsorption and diffusion of molecules in flexible nanoporous materials.

tools.name: aiida-zeopp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Zeo++
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin for Zeo++, a software package for performing geometry analysis of porous materials, enabling automated high-throughput characterization of pore structures.

tools.name: aiida-explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive provenance browser for AiiDA databases
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for exploring AiiDA databases, allowing users to visualize and navigate the provenance graphs of computational materials science data.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Custom workflow manager for Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: The workflow management system for the Materials Project, merging pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks to automate high-throughput materials computations.

tools.name: atomate2
tools.one_line_profile: Library of computational materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A modern library of computational materials science workflows, serving as a successor to Atomate, designed to run complex simulations using Jobflow and FireWorks.

tools.name: FireWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for high-throughput computing
tools.detailed_description: FireWorks is a workflow software for running high-throughput calculation workflows at supercomputing centers. It is used extensively by the Materials Project to manage millions of VASP calculations.

tools.name: jobflow
tools.one_line_profile: Library for writing computational workflows
tools.detailed_description: Jobflow is a library for writing computational workflows that is designed to be used with FireWorks or other workflow managers. It provides a clean API for defining jobs and flows.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations
tools.detailed_description: MPmorph is a collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations, specifically tailored for VASP and integrated with the Materials Project ecosystem.

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Robust materials analysis library for structure and electronic structure
tools.detailed_description: Python Materials Genomics (pymatgen) is a core library for materials analysis, defining classes for structures and molecules, and supporting input/output for many electronic structure codes like VASP.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for alloy system analysis
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen containing classes and tools specifically for describing and analyzing alloy systems.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis modules for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A specialized add-on for pymatgen to perform analysis of point defects in materials, including formation energy calculations and thermodynamic analysis.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Database management tool for Materials Project style data
tools.detailed_description: Pymatgen-db allows the creation and management of Materials Project-style databases (MongoDB) for storing and querying materials calculation data.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Input/output validator for VASP calculations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive validator to ensure VASP calculation inputs and outputs are compatible with Materials Project standards and data quality requirements.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion analysis tools for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen providing algorithms and tools for analyzing diffusion pathways and mechanisms in materials (e.g., NEB analysis).

tools.name: aiida-autocas
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automatic active space selection
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin designed to perform automatic selection of active spaces for multireference quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: aiida-dynamic-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic workflow definition for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that enables the dynamic definition of workflows using Python functions, enhancing flexibility in scientific pipeline creation.

tools.name: aiida-pyscf
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for PySCF
tools.detailed_description: A plugin integrating the Python-based Simulations of Chemistry Framework (PySCF) into the AiiDA workflow engine for automated quantum chemistry simulations.

tools.name: MISPR
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Science Productivity and Reproducibility software
tools.detailed_description: MISPR is a software framework for automating materials science computations, focusing on productivity and reproducibility of workflows.

tools.name: Psiflow
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable molecular simulation framework
tools.detailed_description: Psiflow is a library for scalable molecular simulations, likely integrating machine learning potentials or advanced sampling methods (implied by context of molmod group).

tools.name: abcv
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based crystal viewer using fresnel
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool for crystal structures that leverages pymatgen for structure handling and fresnel for high-quality rendering.

tools.name: aiida-gaussian
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Gaussian quantum chemistry software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin to interface the Gaussian quantum chemistry software with the AiiDA workflow engine, enabling automated electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: aiidalab-empa-surfaces
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab app for on-surface chemistry
tools.detailed_description: An application running on the AiiDAlab platform specifically designed for simulating and analyzing on-surface chemistry reactions and structures.

tools.name: materialite
tools.one_line_profile: Microstructure modeling for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A NASA-backed tool for streamlined microstructure modeling, facilitating the connection between materials science and mechanics.

tools.name: openff-forcefields
tools.one_line_profile: Versioning and distribution of Open Force Field Initiative force fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides versioned force field files (SMIRNOFF format) produced by the Open Force Field Initiative for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen IO module for OpenMM simulation setup
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that facilitates the setup of OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations using Pymatgen's data structures and input generation capabilities.

tools.name: widget-bandsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for electronic band structure visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter notebook widget designed to interactively plot and visualize electronic band structures and density of states (DOS) for materials science.

tools.name: Molten-Salt-Simulation-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput MD workflow for molten halide salts
tools.detailed_description: A workflow toolkit for computing thermophysical properties and microstructure information of molten halide salts using high-throughput molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: pyiron_atomistics
tools.one_line_profile: Atomistic simulation interface for pyiron IDE
tools.detailed_description: A component of the pyiron IDE that provides interfaces and workflows for various atomistic simulation codes (like LAMMPS, VASP) to enable integrated materials science research.

tools.name: executorlib
tools.one_line_profile: HPC execution library for pyiron workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to upscale functions for high-performance computing (HPC) environments, serving as a backend execution component for the pyiron workflow ecosystem.

tools.name: ironflow
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical user interface for pyiron workflows
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter-based graphical user interface for constructing, managing, and visualizing pyiron workflows in computational materials science.

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Development Environment for materials science
tools.detailed_description: An integrated development environment (IDE) for computational materials science that combines workflow management, data management, and simulation codes into a unified platform.

tools.name: pyiron_atomistics
tools.one_line_profile: Core atomistic simulation module for pyiron
tools.detailed_description: The dedicated module within the pyiron ecosystem for handling atomistic simulations, structure manipulation, and interfacing with engines like LAMMPS and VASP.

tools.name: pyiron_base
tools.one_line_profile: Base workflow and data management for pyiron
tools.detailed_description: The core infrastructure of pyiron providing job management, database interaction, and workflow orchestration capabilities independent of specific physics domains.

tools.name: pyiron_contrib
tools.one_line_profile: Community extensions for pyiron
tools.detailed_description: A repository for experimental and user-contributed modules, protocols, and extensions to the core pyiron functionality.

tools.name: pyiron_ontology
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology-guided workflow design for pyiron
tools.detailed_description: A module combining pyiron with owlready2 to enable ontologically guided workflow design and knowledge representation in materials science simulations.

tools.name: pyiron_potentialfit
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning potential fitting with pyiron
tools.detailed_description: A pyiron module dedicated to fitting machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) using atomistic simulation data.

tools.name: pyiron_workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based workflow engine for pyiron
tools.detailed_description: A node-based workflow engine for pyiron allowing users to define complex scientific workflows using a graph representation.

tools.name: structuretoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Atomistic structure analysis and visualization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for building, analyzing, and visualizing atomistic structures, used within the pyiron ecosystem for materials science applications.

tools.name: python-workflow-definition
tools.one_line_profile: Interoperability standards for scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: Defines common Python workflow interfaces to enable interoperability between different materials science workflow engines like AiiDA, Jobflow, and Pyiron.

tools.name: Dock-MD-FEP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated binding free energy calculation workflow
tools.detailed_description: An all-in-one workflow for automated binding free energy calculations between proteins and small molecules using OpenMM and free energy perturbation (FEP).

tools.name: ComBat
tools.one_line_profile: Database of Li-S electrolyte properties
tools.detailed_description: A database containing quantum-chemical and molecular dynamics properties for Lithium-Sulfur (Li-S) battery electrolytes.

tools.name: Polymer-Molecular-Dynamics
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput polymer MD simulation workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based workflow tool to perform high-throughput molecular dynamics simulations for calculating various properties of polymers.

tools.name: atomate2_ffforge
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for MLIP generation
tools.detailed_description: A workflow built on atomate2 and jobflow for autonomously building machine-learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) via active learning, targeting batteries and other materials.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Slater-Koster tight-binding solver
tools.detailed_description: A scientific Python package for solving Slater-Koster tight-binding topological Hamiltonians for electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: aiida_siesta_plugin
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Siesta DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with the Siesta DFT code, enabling automated electronic structure calculations and workflows.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIP)
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with machine learning interatomic potentials, enabling automated materials screening and property prediction using ML force fields.

tools.name: Signac
tools.one_line_profile: R toolkit for the analysis of single-cell chromatin data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package for the analysis of single-cell chromatin accessibility data (scATAC-seq), providing methods for quantification, normalization, dimension reduction, and visualization.

tools.name: ArchRtoSignac
tools.one_line_profile: Conversion tool from ArchRProject to Signac SeuratObject
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate interoperability between single-cell analysis frameworks by converting ArchR project objects into Signac-compatible Seurat objects.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive python library for atomistic materials design, providing tools for high-throughput calculations, machine learning (JARVIS-ML), and force-field analysis (JARVIS-FF), developed by NIST.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: MAterials Simulation Toolkit for use with pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A workflow manager for materials science simulations, designed to automate and manage high-throughput DFT calculations using pymatgen structures.

tools.name: MAST-ML
tools.one_line_profile: MAterials Simulation Toolkit for Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based toolkit designed to facilitate the application of machine learning to materials science research, offering pipelines for data cleaning, feature engineering, model training, and analysis.

tools.name: aiida-yambo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Yambo calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to manage and automate calculations with the Yambo code (Many-Body Perturbation Theory).

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Library for drawing ternary diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for creating highly customizable ternary diagrams (phase diagrams), commonly used in materials science and chemistry for visualizing composition data.
